summary: A DEFECTIVE WELD ON THE DRIVER SIDE DOOR CHECK ATTACHMENT CAUSED LOUD POPPING NOISE EVERY TIME THE DOOR WAS USED.  PROBLEM PROGRESSED INTO A FULL FAILURE OF STRAP/CHECK MECHANISM AND DAMAGE TO POWER WINDOW.  THE PERVASIVE MANUFACTURER DEFECT CANNOT BE SUSTAINED AS AN OWNER MAINTENANCE RESPONSIBILITY BY TOYOTA.  THE BROKEN PART HAS FALLEN INTO THE DOOR CAVITY. *TR
